---
title: "40-modelling"
output: html_notebook

## Prepare data for modelling

```{r prepare data}
dest_prepare <- dest %>% 
  calc_month(date_first_booking) %>%
  age_dummy(age) %>% 
  #booking_record(date_first_booking) %>%
  #day_of_week(date_first_booking) %>%
  select(country_destination,id,month,age_under_40,gender,signup_method,language,first_browser)

dest_prepare

write.csv(dest_prepare,"dest_prepare.csv")
```

## Test with asserts/verifys

```{r test function1}
dest_prepare %>% 
  assert(in_set(NA,"January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"),month)
```


```{r test function2}
dest_prepare %>% 
  assert(in_set(NA,0,1),age_under_40)
```
